thread.title: BRIEF-KEMC Fund IV Gp, Llc Reports 8.1 Pct Stake In Carrizo Oil & Gas Inc As Of March 26, 2018 SEC Filing‍​

title: BRIEF-KEMC Fund IV Gp, Llc Reports 8.1 Pct Stake In Carrizo Oil & Gas Inc As Of March 26, 2018 SEC Filing‍​
text:
Market News April 5, 2018 / 12:48 PM / in 21 minutes BRIEF-KEMC Fund IV Gp, Llc Reports 8.1 Pct Stake In Carrizo Oil & Gas Inc As Of March 26, 2018 SEC Filing‍​ Reuters Staff 
April 5 (Reuters) - Carrizo Oil & Gas Inc: * SEC FILING‍​ 
* KEMC FUND IV GP SAYS ACQUIRED CARRIZO OIL & GAS’ SHARES IN THE BELIEF THAT THE SHARES ARE UNDERVALUED AND ARE AN ATTRACTIVE INVESTMENT 
* KEMC FUND IV GP SAYS KIMMERIDGE PRINCIPALS HAD NUMEROUS CONSTRUCTIVE DISCUSSIONS WITH CARRIZO OIL & GAS’ MANAGEMENT ON CO’S BUSINESS, STRATEGIES 
* CORE ASSETS & PARTIAL SALES IN EAGLE FORD, UTICA, MARCELLUS, NIOBRARA & REPAYMENT OF DEBT ARE POSITIVE STEPS FOR CARRIZO OIL 
* BELIEVES CARRIZO OIL & GAS SHOULD “STRONGLY” CONSIDER SPECIFIC ACTIONS THAT CAN BE TAKEN TO ENHANCE AND MAXIMIZE SHAREHOLDER VALUE * PLAY 
* KEMC FUND IV GP SAYS BELIEVES CARRIZO OIL SHOULD MERGE WITH ANOTHER OPERATOR WITH PERMIAN OVERLAP TO INCREASE SCALE 
* KEMC FUND IV GP SAYS BELIEVES CARRIZO OIL SHOULD EXIT PART OF EAGLE FORD POSITION & USE PROCEEDS TO REPURCHASE SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF COMMON STOCK 
* BELIEVE CARRIZO OIL WILL NOT BE ABLE TO INCREASE SCALE IN PERMIAN SUFFICIENTLY ABSENT MAJOR A SALE OR MERGER 
* IF CARRIZO OIL BOARD IS UNABLE/UNWILLING TO EXECUTE VIABLE STRATEGIC PATH IN 12 MONTHS, KEMC BELIEVES SHAREHOLDERS WOULD BE BEST SERVED BY SALE OF CO Source text: ( bit.ly/2GU75Qa ) Further company coverage:
